channel.title: Data Science on
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on

item.title: Loss functions
item.description: Loss Functions The loss function calculates the difference between the output of your model and the “Ground Truth” or actual values.

item.title: Dot Product
item.description: What is a Dot Product? The dot product is a way of multiplying two vectors together.

item.title: Introduction to Outlier detection
item.description: As the enterprise moves to real-time and streaming, it gets more important to identify issues fast, ideally, before the final user gets impacted.

item.title: Numpy: ndarrays
item.description: Numpy lets us create arrays in multiple ways, most of the time in consonancy with core Python and other libraries like Pandas.

item.title: Numpy: Introduction
item.description: Introduction Numpy is the core package for scientific computing, it has capabilities for fast processing of n-dimensional arrays and in general linear algebra.
